verses.verse: Now these are the commandments <WH4687>, the statutes <WH2706>, and the judgments <WH4941>, which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> to teach <WH3925> you, that ye might do <WH6213> them in the land <WH776> whither ye go <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it:

That thou mightest fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> all his statutes <WH2708> and his commandments <WH4687>, which I command <WH6680> thee, thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy son's <WH1121> son <WH1121>, all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>; and that thy days <WH3117> may be prolonged <WH748>.

¶ Hear <WH8085> therefore, O Israel <WH3478>, and observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> it; that it may be well <WH3190> with thee, and that ye may increase <WH7235> mightily <WH3966>, as the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of thy fathers <WH1> hath promised <WH1696> thee, in the land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.
Hear <WH8085>, O Israel <WH3478>: The LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> is one <WH259> LORD <WH3068>:
And thou shalt love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>, and with all thy might <WH3966>.
And these words <WH1697>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, shall be in thine heart <WH3824>:

And thou shalt teach them diligently <WH8150> unto thy children <WH1121>, and shalt talk <WH1696> of them when thou sittest <WH3427> in thine house <WH1004>, and when thou walkest <WH3212> by the way <WH1870>, and when thou liest down <WH7901>, and when thou risest up <WH6965>.
And thou shalt bind <WH7194> them for a sign <WH226> upon thine hand <WH3027>, and they shall be as frontlets <WH2903> between thine eyes <WH5869>.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> them upon the posts <WH4201> of thy house <WH1004>, and on thy gates <WH8179>.

And it shall be, when the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall have brought <WH935> thee into the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>, to Abraham <WH85>, to Isaac <WH3327>, and to Jacob <WH3290>, to give <WH5414> thee great <WH1419> and goodly <WH2896> cities <WH5892>, which thou buildedst <WH1129> not,

And houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of all good <WH2898> things, which thou filledst <WH4390> not, and wells <WH953> digged <WH2672>, which thou diggedst <WH2672> not, vineyards <WH3754> and olive trees <WH2132>, which thou plantedst <WH5193> not; when thou shalt have eaten <WH398> and be full <WH7646>;
Then beware <WH8104> lest thou forget <WH7911> the LORD <WH3068>, which brought thee forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>.
Thou shalt fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> him, and shalt swear <WH7650> by his name <WH8034>.
Ye shall not go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, of the gods <WH430> of the people <WH5971> which are round about <WH5439> you;

(For the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> is a jealous <WH7067> God <WH410> among <WH7130> you) lest the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> be kindled <WH2734> against thee, and destroy <WH8045> thee from off the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
¶ Ye shall not tempt <WH5254> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, as ye tempted <WH5254> him in Massah <WH4532>.

Ye shall diligently <WH8104> keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and his testimonies <WH5713>, and his statutes <WH2706>, which he hath commanded <WH6680> thee.

And thou shalt do <WH6213> that which is right <WH3477> and good <WH2896> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068>: that it may be well <WH3190> with thee, and that thou mayest go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>,
To cast out <WH1920> all thine enemies <WH341> from before <WH6440> thee, as the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696>.

And when thy son <WH1121> asketh <WH7592> thee in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559>, What mean the testimonies <WH5713>, and the statutes <WH2706>, and the judgments <WH4941>, which the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> you?

Then thou shalt say <WH559> unto thy son <WH1121>, We were Pharaoh's <WH6547> bondmen <WH5650> in Egypt <WH4714>; and the LORD <WH3068> brought us out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>:

And the LORD <WH3068> shewed <WH5414> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159>, great <WH1419> and sore <WH7451>, upon Egypt <WH4714>, upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon all his household <WH1004>, before our eyes <WH5869>:
And he brought us out <WH3318> from thence, that he might bring us in <WH935>, to give <WH5414> us the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> unto our fathers <WH1>.

And the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> us to do <WH6213> all these statutes <WH2706>, to fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>, for our good <WH2896> always <WH3117>, that he might preserve us alive <WH2421>, as it is at this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be our righteousness <WH6666>, if we observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all these <WH2063> commandments <WH4687> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>, as he hath commanded <WH6680> us.
